thread.title: "I get paid quite well to NOT be biased": Rylan Clark-Neal denies CBB BOTS favours certain housemates
thread.title_full: "I get paid quite well to NOT be biased": Rylan Clark-Neal denies CBB BOTS favours certain housemates

author: Lara Martin
title: "I get paid quite well to NOT be biased": Rylan Clark-Neal denies CBB BOTS favours certain housemates
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Rylan Clark-Neal has hit out at accusations Celebrity Big Brother’s Bit On The Side can favour some housemates, insisting he is NEVER biased. 
The spin-off show host had a bit of a rant during a Facebook Live on the Big Brother page today, quipping: “I get paid quite well to not be biased.” 
“I’m gonna have a bit of a rant,” he started. 
“Do you know what winds me up? I’m gonna tell you this now. One night I’ll get, ‘Oh your audience are so pro-Jedward, it’s so biased.’ The next night, ‘Oh your audience is so pro-Nicola.' Rylan said he's NEVER biased on BOTS (Photo: Facebook/CBB) Rylan said the housemates' family and friends would all agree he's not biased (Photo: Facebook/CBB) Read More When is the Celebrity Big Brother 2017 final? Date, time and all you need to know about the exciting finale 
"Do you know what? People have different opinions. That’s what Twitter is for. Voice your opinions!” 
Rylan continued: “Stop saying I’m biased. I’m not biased! I get paid quite well to not be biased. I’m never biased. 
“If you notice, when someone on the panel says something bad about one of the housemates I’ll find someone in the audience who says something nice about them. That’s my job.” Rylan said he always makes sure there is a balanced view of all housemates (Photo: Facebook/CBB) Rylan is a popular BOTS host (Photo: Supplied by WENN) Read More Where's Calum Best? Star is a NO-SHOW on Celebrity Big Brother's Bit On The Side 
“I know it comes as part and parcel of my job,” he said. “I’m gonna get all of these comments on Twitter and that’s fine, I deal with it. I just want to put it out there. At the end of the day, I don’t have an opinion. I genuinely don’t. 
“Yes, there are certain housemates I like more but I never let that come across on the show. I really wouldn’t. It’s not worth my job… I just wanted to put that out there as it’s been bugging me today.” 
*CBB airs 9pm on Channel 5 Read More
